creditline: Gift of Tamara and Michael Root
description: small round pot (a) with small foot and notch in rim for a spoon; domed lid (b) with small cylindrical knob; decorated on both lid and body with brown arches on a blue ground; celedon on foot and lip
medium: Porcelain, celadon glaze with thin cobalt wash, iron brush work
signed: lower body near foot, impressed St. Ives seal and painted signature: BL
title: Marmalade pot
